get_states_of_all_devices.success_prompt: Here is the status of all your Home Assistant devices.
get_states_of_all_devices.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the status of your Home Assistant devices at this time.

examples.user: Can you check the status of my smart home devices?
Check the state of my home automation devices.
Show me the current status of my connected devices.

turn_on_light.success_prompt: The light has been turned on, report that.
turn_on_light.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't turn the light of this Home Assistant device on at this time.

examples.user: Can you turn the light at the altar on?
Make the lamp for Couch Unten on.
I want the bulb for the PC Ecke to be switched on.

turn_off_light.success_prompt: The light has been turned off, report that.
turn_off_light.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't turn the light of this Home Assistant device off at this time.

examples.user: Can you turn the light at the altar off?
Make the lamp for Couch Unten off.
I want the bulb for the PC Ecke to be switched off.

turn_on_switch.success_prompt: The switch has been turned on, report that.
turn_on_switch.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't turn the switch of this Home Assistant device on at this time.

examples.user: Turn the switch for the Kaffeemaschine on.
Can you turn on the switch for the Ventilator?
I want the Duftlampe to be switched on.

turn_off_switch.success_prompt: The switch has been turned off, report that.
turn_off_switch.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't turn the switch of this Home Assistant device off at this time.

examples.user: Can you turn the switch for the Kaffeemaschine off?
Can you turn off the switch for the Ventilator?
I want the Duftlampe to be switched off.

set_light_color.success_prompt: The light color has been set, report that.
set_light_color.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't set the light color of this Home Assistant device on at this time.

examples.user: Can you make the light at the altar green?
Make the lamp for Couch Unten shine in a nice mellow orange way.
I want the bulb for the PC Ecke to be somewhat cherry red.

set_temperature.success_prompt: The temperature has been set, report that.
set_temperature.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't set the temperature of this Home Assistant device at this time.

examples.user: Can you set the living room temperature to 22 degrees?
Adjust the temperature in the bedroom to 20 degrees.
I want to set the thermostat in the kitchen to 18 degrees.

lock.success_prompt: The lock has been secured, report that.
lock.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't secure the lock of this Home Assistant device at this time.

examples.user: Can you lock the front door?
Secure the back door.
I want to lock the garage door.

unlock.success_prompt: The lock has been unsecured, report that.
unlock.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't unsecure the lock of this Home Assistant device at this time.

examples.user: Can you unlock the front door?
Unsecure the back door.
I want to unlock the garage door.

get_config.success_prompt: Here is the current configuration of your Home Assistant system.
get_config.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the configuration of your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you show me the current configuration of my Home Assistant system?
Show me the settings of my smart home system.
I want to see the current configuration settings of my home automation system.

get_events.success_prompt: Here are the events in your Home Assistant system.
get_events.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the events of your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you show me the events in my Home Assistant system?
Show me the recent activities in my smart home system.
I want to see the events in my home automation system.

get_services.success_prompt: Here are the available services in your Home Assistant system.
get_services.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the services of your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you show me the services available in my Home Assistant system?
Show me the available actions in my smart home system.
I want to see the services available in my home automation system.

get_history.success_prompt: Here is the history of the specified entity in your Home Assistant system.
get_history.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the history of the specified entity in your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you show me the history of the living room light for the past day?
Retrieve the history of my bedroom thermostat for the past week.
I want to see the history of the kitchen door lock for the past month.

get_logbook.success_prompt: Here are the logbook entries in your Home Assistant system.
get_logbook.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the logbook entries of your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you show me the logbook entries for the living room light for the past day?
Retrieve the logbook entries for my bedroom thermostat for the past week.
I want to see the logbook entries for the kitchen door lock for the past month.

update_state.success_prompt: The state has been updated, report that.
update_state.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't update the state of this Home Assistant device at this time.

examples.user: Can you update the state of the living room light to on?
Turn the bedroom thermostat off.
I want to change the state of the kitchen door lock to locked.

fire_event.success_prompt: The event has been fired, report that.
fire_event.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't fire the event in your Home Assistant system at this time.

examples.user: Can you trigger the custom_event event in my Home Assistant system?
Initiate the alarm_triggered event in my smart home system.
I want to fire the motion_detected event in my home automation system.
